alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 1:21PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Twin Falls and central Jerome Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 121 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hollister, or 19 miles south of Twin Falls, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rock Creek around 130 PM MDT. Twin Falls, Jerome, Kimberly and Hansen around 140 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for south central Idaho.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley
